AVSEC ORDER NO.  02/2005 
 
In exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act 1934  delegated to him vide 
Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated July 3, 1997 Commissioner of 
Security(Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation Security for the purpose of securing the safety of aircraft 
operation directs that : 
 
(i) 
Baggage Make - up Area and ATC are declared as Special Security Zones at all Airports in the 
Country served by commercial flights. 
 
(ii) 
The baggage make up area shall be segregated from other restricted area by providing 
suitable partition/fencing. It shall be a separate enclosure with a gate for movement of hold 
baggage and authorized persons. 
 
(iii) 
Unescorted access to baggage make up area shall be on the strength of AEPs (white, navy 
blue, purple, orange) wherein capital letter ‘B’ shall be embossed. 
 
(iv) 
Such AEPs shall be issued only to the bonafide persons for performing duties in the baggage 
make up area. No other person shall be allowed in the baggage make up area. 
 
(v) 
Access of bonafide persons to ATC shall be allowed on the strength of AEPs wherein capital 
letter ‘A’ shall be embossed. 
 
(vi) 
No persons and/ or his/her belongings shall be allowed access to ATC without screening. 
 
The above directions shall be implemented with effect from 1 st May, 2005.    
 
 
 
( R.C. Tayal ) 
 Commissioner of Security (CA)
